Welcome to Shinyhero36’s documentation¶

Shinyhero36 is an extension for Flask that which adds support for quickly crating wehbooks for Google Assistant App.

Get started with Installation and then get an overview with the Quickstart.

Shinyhero36 depends on Flask. The documentation for this library can be found at

  • Flask documentation

User’s Guide¶

This part of the documentation will show yoou how to get started in using Shinyhero36 with Flask

    • RichResponses
